channel.title: Prerequisite on Recommender System Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Prerequisite on Recommender System Solution

item.title: WORKSHOP SETUP
item.description: This section includes following steps: AWS Cloud9 Create an IAM role for your workspace Attach the IAM role to your workspace Update IAM settings for your workspace Create an SSH key

item.title: Setup All the Required tools
item.description: TO complete this workshop, you will need to install following tools: Install eksctl Create an IAM role for your workspace Attach the IAM role to your workspace Update IAM settings for your workspace
